title: Definition of Sample Space
text: The sample space of an experiment is the set of all possible outcomes. In this scenario, we can represent each outcome as one of each of the whole numbers that starts at one and is less than 20.

title: Determining the Sample Space
text: Knowing the definition of a sample space, what then, is the sample space of whole numbers starting at one and less than 20? What is the list of numbers that starts at one and all of which are less than 20?
